column6: WAR BABY PART 1 Cable has been tasked with safeguarding the Messiah of the mutant race! To protect the infant savior, Cable heads to the future. But hot on his trail is a relentless enemy who won't stop until blood is spilled!
column8: | editor:Axel Alonso | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Ariel Olivetti | writer:Duane Swierczynski
